about.name: Jiatu
about.aboutMe.p1: Hi! I'm Jiatu, a frontend engineer passionate about technology. I love exploring new tech, solving complex problems, and sharing insights through my blog.
about.aboutMe.p2: I focus on modern frontend stacks like React, TypeScript and Node.js. I'm also keen on design patterns, performance optimization, and user experience.
about.otherSkillsList: Git, Docker, CI/CD, Performance, Responsive Design
